title: Trendustrial Zeit and Magic 3/4: Lola Bunny, NBA, Evacuation, Vaccine
itunes:title: Trendustrial Zeit and Magic 3/4: Lola Bunny, NBA, Evacuation, Vaccine
description:
On this edition of Trendustrial Zeit and Magic Jack and Miles discuss Lola Bunny being less sexualized in the Space Jam sequel, Joel Embiid ejected for trash talk, TJ McConnell rare triple-double, Damian Lillard clutch af, Brooklyn Nets crushing it, an evacuation order issued for NZ's North Island following earthquakes/tsunami warning, and vaccine nationalism means that poor countries will be left behind.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
